data.app_name: Glider Sim - Hang Gliding / Paragliding Simulator
data.description:
**Welcome to Glider Sim: Your Ultimate VR Soaring Experience!**

Choose from the Hang Glider, Paraglider, Paramotor, Mini-Wing, Speed-Wing, and even a Racing Drone! 

Fly across 3 large open-world maps that include:

- Sun Valley, USA
- Walenstadt, Switzerland (Swiss Alps)
- Grand Teton, USA

Each map, spanning approximately 50 kmÂ², is crafted from real-world satellite imagery and enhanced with high-resolution textures and lush vegetation. Choose from hundreds of launch points on each map.


**Dynamic Weather System:** Customize your flying conditions with adjustable wind direction and strength, as well as time of day. The sun angle and terrain dynamically influence thermal activity and cloud formation. Toggle wind particles on or off to visualize thermals and ridge lift! 


**Flight Physics:** Experience the precision of true-to-life flight mechanics. Each cell of your glider is simulated with soft-body physics, allowing for maneuvers like wingovers, spirals, stalls, and swoops. Stay vigilant to prevent your paraglider from collapsing mid-flight!


**Challenges:** Test your skills with Scored Challenges on each map. Compete in Speed Flying challenges, Cross Country (XC) Races, and more. Monthly leaderboards let you see how you stack up against pilots worldwide.


**Single Player / Multiplayer:** Enjoy solo flights in Single Player mode or join friends and other pilots in Multiplayer mode. Connect with our community on Discord to organize flights and participate in multiplayer competitions!

changelog.change_log: Add Hang Glider XC Challenge 1 to Sun Valley Map, Update UI Map Select Screen, Adjust Ridge Lift Algorthim, Adjust Paraglider Sink Rate
Add Hang Glider XC Challenge 1 to Tetons map, Add private passcode protected multiplayer sessions, Adjust center of gravity on hang glider. Add new logo and splash screen.
Fix Multiplayer Bug. Remove thermals forming over water.
Add Hang Glider XC Challenge on Swiss Alps. Reduce Tree Flickering. Improve Hang Glider Physics. UI Updates.
Add Spectator Cam to Glide Options. Fix force feedback vibration not working correctly on right hand controller.
Fix Hang Glider Jitter. Add appropriate Quest 2 and Quest 3 hand controller models. Add more menu items in VR options. More hot fixes...
Hang Glider Update.
Hot Fix. Remove control damping on the speed wing and miniwing. Add experimental shadows will not render warning on Enable Dynamic Resolution option.

Fix leaderboards not uploading. Massive performance improvements. Add Graphics settings. Enable Dynamic Resolution. Dynamic Foviated Rendering. 90 Hz Refresh Rate. Add landclass sampling to thermal spawning algorithm.

Add Leaderboards to every challenge. Add ability to change time of day. Revamped the thermal system to be based of time of day (look for thermal on sunward facing slopes). Add XC challenge to Tetons and Sun Valley maps.
Add two more speed wing challenges to Sun Valley. Add in protoype XC Race challenge to Swiss Alps. Improve Speedwing flight physics. Various Bug Fixes.
Add scored speed challenges to each map. Update UI. Improve Performance.
Make Platforms Wider. Now can reposition launch point anywhere. Now can launch glider at landing spot.
Perfromance Improvments. Ability to start with wing deflated. UI updates.
New Tetons Mountains Map!, add depth buffer to reduces flickering water, add Experimental Graphics options, Update to Multiplayer 1.4.
Update to Multiplayer 1.3 so you can play with Steam users.

Fix thermal sync over multiplayer. Improve multiplayer performance by limiting client glider visual details at far distances. Reduce paramator motor volume. Increase the clipping plane so doesn't cut off distant terrain.
Print Error Messages at Login Screen. Please Report if you can not get past the home screen! Increase graphics a little for Quest 2 headsets.

Add Ski Lift to Swiss Alps Map. Fix map Icons not aligning to terrain on Swiss Map. Fix issue with controls not being shown. Remap the speed bar bindings to left controller Y X button presses. Rotate camera now binded to right thumbstick VR controller. Add 10 more launch points to Swiss Alps map.
Big Update! Add Multiplayer. Add new map Swiss Alps. Improved Physics. Improved Sun Valley, ID Scenery. Add many more launch points. In-Game 2D Map. Many More updates.
